mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, name, address, cellphone, logo, operator_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: update t_coupon_qrc_enterprise set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
